text: pre our chat later today: Constraints are a cornerstone of design, and a fantastic spur to innovative creativity. For several years now, the constraints common in the developing world have proven a source of myriad innovative approaches to what seemed to be commonplace, or solved dilemmas in more developed nations, and their inspiration has spread globally.  The style and flavor of innovation that pioneering entrepreneurs and netizens in Cuba are undertaking offers an unprecedented opportunity to understand how innovative creativity flourishes under extreme constraints, and represents a chance to help validate and align a community of problem solvers so that they may become influential forces in the further evolution of modern connected society.
